title: FtR - MIST SD LAN/WLAN - Process design
description:
Description
As a customer
I want to open an incident for my MIST S LAN/WLAN solution through a customer self service portal or via a hotline or Mail, and I want some status information’s and the solution date.
So that I can be sure that a solution is being worked on.
  As a Telekom employee
I want to receive all the necessary information’s about an Incident and solve it by following a clean, straightforward and well documented process with clear roles and responsibilities
So that our customer gets a quick solution.
  User Story: Exploration Simplification: Send and implementation HW à Nummer an Yvonne Winkelmann
acceptance_criteria: It is clear who executes which tasks
Interfaces and parameters to other systems are defined and coordinated
Documentation is finished (Aris – Happy Path and Fallouts)
